mapper.update:
update activityreport
activityId = #{activityid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
activityTypeID = #{activitytypeid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
countActivity = #{countactivity,jdbcType=INTEGER},
onLine = #{online,jdbcType=BIT},
AveragePeople = #{averagepeople,jdbcType=INTEGER},
branchId = #{branchid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
DuringTime = #{duringtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
totalPrice = #{totalprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
totalExpenditure = #{totalexpenditure,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where ActivityReporId = #{activityreporid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update activityreport set activityId = #{activityid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, activityTypeID = #{activitytypeid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, countActivity = #{countactivity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, onLine = #{online,jdbcType=BIT}, AveragePeople = #{averagepeople,jdbcType=INTEGER}, branchId = #{branchid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DuringTime = #{duringtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, totalPrice = #{totalprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, totalExpenditure = #{totalexpenditure,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where ActivityReporId = #{activityreporid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select count(a.activityId) countReg,SUM(b.totalPrice) totalReg,SUM(b.totalExpenditure) totalExpend,c.activityname activityname from activityreport b,activityregistery a,activity c where a.activityId = b.activityId and a.activityId = c.activityId and a.activityId = #{activityid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
